description: Operations Dashboard - Real-time health monitoring, SLA tracking, capacity planning, and incident correlation. Enhanced with Phase 3 operational intelligence.

targets.expr: 100 * (1 - ((sum(rate(zen_watcher_observations_create_errors_total[5m])) or vector(0)) / clamp_min((sum(rate(zen_watcher_observations_created_total[5m])) or vector(0)) + (sum(rate(zen_watcher_observations_create_errors_total[5m])) or vector(0)), 0.001)))

panels.description: Live system health status with traffic light indicators
panels.title: 🟢 Real-time Health Status

targets.expr: sum by (source) ((zen_watcher_observations_created_total or vector(0)) - (zen_watcher_observations_deduped_total or vector(0)))

panels.description: Performance metrics compared to industry benchmarks
panels.title: 📈 Performance vs Industry Benchmarks

panels.title: 🔗 Incident Correlation Matrix

title: Zen Watcher - Operations
